parameters.name: AiNodes
parameters.description: A list of AI nodes for model deployment.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. For more information, see [How do I ensure the idempotence?](~~327176~~)

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in the specified region.

parameters.name: InferenceEngine
parameters.description: The inference engine. Only vllm is supported.

parameters.name: Replicas
parameters.description: The number of model service replicas.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs. For more information about how to get the ID of a resource group, see [View the basic information of a resource group](~~151181~~).

parameters.name: SecurityIPList
parameters.description:
The IP address whitelist.

127.0.0.1 indicates that access from any external IP address is prohibited. You can call the [ModifySecurityIps](~~86928~~) operation to modify the IP address whitelist after the instance is created.
